title: The Nitrogen cycle
creator_credit: Thora James, Frank Wells, J. Arthur Rank Organisation and Gaumont-British Instructional
brief_description: The film demonstrates the route followed by nitrogen in its circulation between the atmosphere and compounds making up the protoplasm of living organisms.
